dict.acceptation: 保持，维持；保养，维护；抚养，赡养；

sent.orig: Product Features Not dehydration, diarrhea, skin to maintain flexibility, not dieting to maintain energetic.
sent.trans: 不脱水、不腹泻、保持皮肤弹性、无需节食、保持精力旺盛。

sent.orig: If we do not maintain justice, justice will not maintain us.
sent.trans: 我们不维护正义，正义就不会维护我们。

sent.orig: Maintain the instrument body with mesh, used to maintain the institutions connected to the board.
sent.trans: 工具可与保持机构啮合，用于将保持机构连接于该板。

sent.orig: Improve and maintain OEE system and report, manage and maintain the basic tool information.
sent.trans: 优化和维护OEE系统及其报表，管理和维护设备相关基本信息。

sent.orig: In this case, how to maintain degree of financial control order to maintain financial market stability?
sent.trans: 在这种情况下如何维持一定的金融控制力以维护金融市场稳定呢？
